Name: Add-DtcClusterTMMapping
Synopsis: Adds a cluster DTC mapping.

Name: Get-Dtc
Synopsis: Gets DTC instances.

Name: Get-DtcAdvancedHostSetting
Synopsis: Queries the DTC host level properties in the registry.

Name: Get-DtcAdvancedSetting
Synopsis: Queries the advanced setting for MSDTC in the registry.

Name: Get-DtcClusterDefault
Synopsis: Retrieves the default cluster server.

Name: Get-DtcClusterTMMapping
Synopsis: Gets cluster DTC Mapping data.

Name: Get-DtcDefault
Synopsis: Gets the default DTC instance.

Name: Get-DtcLog
Synopsis: Gets DTC log file settings.

Name: Get-DtcNetworkSetting
Synopsis: Gets DTC network and security configuration settings.

Name: Get-DtcTransaction
Synopsis: Gets information about transactions being handled by the DTC instance.

Name: Get-DtcTransactionsStatistics
Synopsis: Gets a summary of transactions.

Name: Get-DtcTransactionsTraceSession
Synopsis: Gets the DTC transactions trace session specific setting of the host.

Name: Get-DtcTransactionsTraceSetting
Synopsis: Gets the DTC transactions trace setting of the host.

Name: Install-Dtc
Synopsis: Installs the local transactions coordinator.

Name: Remove-DtcClusterTMMapping
Synopsis: Removes a cluster DTC mapping.

Name: Reset-DtcLog
Synopsis: Resets the log file of a DTC instance.

Name: Set-DtcAdvancedHostSetting
Synopsis: Sets the DTC host level properties in the registry.

Name: Set-DtcAdvancedSetting
Synopsis: Sets DTC instance specific properties in the registry.

Name: Set-DtcClusterDefault
Synopsis: Sets the cluster default transactions coordinator.

Name: Set-DtcClusterTMMapping
Synopsis: Modifies an existing cluster DTC mapping.

Name: Set-DtcDefault
Synopsis: Sets the default transactions coordinator.

Name: Set-DtcLog
Synopsis: Modifies the log file settings of a DTC instance.

Name: Set-DtcNetworkSetting
Synopsis: Modifies DTC network and security configuration for a DTC instance.

Name: Set-DtcTransaction
Synopsis: Modifies the state of a transaction.

Name: Set-DtcTransactionsTraceSession
Synopsis: Modifies the DTC transactions trace setting of the host.

Name: Set-DtcTransactionsTraceSetting
Synopsis: Modifies the DTC transactions trace setting of the host.

Name: Start-Dtc
Synopsis: Starts the DTC instance.

Name: Start-DtcTransactionsTraceSession
Synopsis: Starts a new DTC transactions trace session for the host.

Name: Stop-Dtc
Synopsis: Stops a DTC instance.

Name: Stop-DtcTransactionsTraceSession
Synopsis: Stops the active DTC transactions trace session on the host.

Name: Test-Dtc
Synopsis: Tests whether two computers can participate in networked transactions.

Name: Uninstall-Dtc
Synopsis: Uninstalls the local transactions coordinator.

Name: Write-DtcTransactionsTraceSession
Synopsis: Writes the data from an active DTC transactions trace session into the log file.

Name: Complete-DtcDiagnosticTransaction
Synopsis: Invokes the Commit process if the specified transaction is the root transaction; otherwise, invokes the Complete method on a transaction object.

Name: Join-DtcDiagnosticResourceManager
Synopsis: Enlists a diagnostic Resource Manager for a transaction object.

Name: New-DtcDiagnosticTransaction
Synopsis: Creates a new transaction in a Transaction Manager on the local computer.

Name: Receive-DtcDiagnosticTransaction
Synopsis: Propagates a transaction from a given diagnostic Resource Manager.

Name: Send-DtcDiagnosticTransaction
Synopsis: Propagates a transaction to a specified diagnostic Resource Manager.

Name: Start-DtcDiagnosticResourceManager
Synopsis: Starts a diagnostic Resource Manager.

Name: Stop-DtcDiagnosticResourceManager
Synopsis: Stops and removes a diagnostic Resource Manager job.

Name: Undo-DtcDiagnosticTransaction
Synopsis: Invokes the Abort process on the specified transaction.
